title: Subsituting Y
text: One of the equations has already been solved for $$y$$. We will substitute $$y=x-3$$ into the equation for the circle.

title: Solving For Y
text: Next, substitute the two x-values into the original linear equation to solve for $$y$$.

title: Verifying the Solution
text: The solutions can be verified by subsituting these (x,y) values into both of the original equations.
